column4: is it possible somehow to tell dhcp that I want certain IP address? I know it is possible to configure some routers to give certain IP address for certain MAC addres, however it is not possible on mine
or you could change the ip settings on the client to static. Though if that address is already taken you could have problems
do you know of any utility that would for instance translate the MAC address to actual IP of that computer?
nope i'm not sure that's possible, mac isn't linked to ip address in the same way as dns name
